byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and THOMAS ERDBRINK
byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon reported from New York, and Thomas Erdbrink from Tehran. Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from the United Nations.

lead_paragraph: Gen. Mohammad Ali Jafari, the head of the Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps, predicted that the Saudi campaign in Yemen would backfire.

headline.print_headline: Yemen Crisis Looms as Kerry Meets With Iranian Counterpart on Nuclear Accord
headline.main: Yemen Crisis Looms as Kerry Meets With Iranian Counterpart on Nuclear Deal

snippet: Gen. Mohammad Ali Jafari, the head of the Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps, predicted that the Saudi campaign in Yemen would backfire.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry meets in New York with Iranian Foreign Min Mohammad Javad Zarif to continue negotiations on Iran's nuclear program and easing of sanctions; Iran's support for Houthi rebels in Yemen and other regional issues loom, but do not seem to influence talks.
